metadata.title: Advanced Audio Integration - Veo 3 Prompts
metadata.description: Advanced audio and dialogue integration techniques for Veo 3 video generation

prompt_templates.name: Natural Dialogue Integration
prompt_templates.description: Seamless integration of natural-sounding dialogue with lip sync

prompt_structure.technical_specs: Clear articulation, natural rhythm, emotional authenticity, lip sync accuracy

examples.prompt: Natural dialogue: 'Welcome to our innovative workspace where creativity meets technology', professional delivery style, confident emotional context, broadcast audio quality, clear articulation, natural rhythm, emotional authenticity, lip sync accuracy

Natural dialogue: 'I can't believe this is actually happening to us right now', emotional delivery style, shocked emotional context, intimate audio quality, clear articulation, natural rhythm, emotional authenticity, lip sync accuracy

best_practices: Write dialogue that sounds natural when spoken
Match emotional context to facial expressions
Specify delivery style for consistent performance
Consider pacing and natural speech patterns
common_mistakes: Mismatched emotion between voice and visuals

prompt_templates.name: Ambient Sound Design
prompt_templates.description: Environmental and atmospheric audio that enhances scene realism

prompt_structure.technical_specs: Layered soundscape, realistic environmental audio, spatial awareness
prompt_structure.environment_types: Urban, nature, interior, industrial, suburban, underwater

examples.prompt: Ambient sound design: bustling urban environment, layered traffic and pedestrian sounds, energetic audio mood, balanced volume levels, layered soundscape, realistic environmental audio, spatial awareness
Ambient sound design: peaceful forest setting, bird calls and rustling leaves, serene audio mood, subtle volume levels, layered soundscape, realistic environmental audio, spatial awareness

best_practices: Layer multiple sound elements for realism
Match audio to visual environment
Use appropriate volume levels for scene context
Consider spatial audio positioning

prompt_templates.name: Musical Score Integration
prompt_templates.description: Background music that supports narrative and emotional content

prompt_structure.technical_specs: Complementary to dialogue, appropriate emotional support, professional mixing
prompt_structure.music_styles: Orchestral, electronic, acoustic, jazz, rock, ambient, minimalist

examples.prompt: Musical score: uplifting orchestral, inspiring emotional tone, string and brass instrumentation, moderate dynamic level, complementary to dialogue, appropriate emotional support, professional mixing

Musical score: subtle ambient electronic, mysterious emotional tone, synthesizer and pad instrumentation, low dynamic level, complementary to dialogue, appropriate emotional support, professional mixing

best_practices: Choose music that supports rather than competes
Match emotional tone to visual content
Use appropriate dynamic levels for dialogue clarity
Consider genre appropriateness for content type
common_mistakes: Music overpowering dialogue or important sounds
Emotional mismatch between music and visuals

prompt_templates.name: Sound Effects Integration
prompt_templates.description: Specific sound effects that enhance actions and environment

prompt_structure.technical_specs: Action-synchronized, realistic timbre, appropriate volume, spatial accuracy
prompt_structure.effect_categories: Foley, mechanical, electronic, natural, impact, movement

examples.prompt: Sound effects: keyboard typing and mouse clicks, precise timing sync, realistic office quality, close spatial placement, action-synchronized, realistic timbre, appropriate volume, spatial accuracy
Sound effects: car engine and door slam, perfect timing sync, realistic automotive quality, exterior spatial placement, action-synchronized, realistic timbre, appropriate volume, spatial accuracy

best_practices: Synchronize effects precisely with visual actions
Use realistic sound quality appropriate to context
Consider spatial placement of sound sources
Balance effect levels with other audio elements
common_mistakes: Poor timing sync with visual actions

prompt_templates.name: Voiceover Narration
prompt_templates.description: Professional narration overlay for explanatory or storytelling content

prompt_structure.technical_specs: Professional recording quality, clear diction, appropriate pacing, emotional engagement
prompt_structure.voice_styles: Authoritative, conversational, warm, energetic, documentary, commercial

examples.prompt: Voiceover narration: 'Our innovative approach to sustainable technology is reshaping the future of clean energy', authoritative voice character, measured delivery pace, broadcast recording quality, professional recording quality, clear diction, appropriate pacing, emotional engagement

Voiceover narration: 'Follow these simple steps to create your perfect morning routine', warm conversational voice character, friendly delivery pace, intimate recording quality, professional recording quality, clear diction, appropriate pacing, emotional engagement

best_practices: Write narration for spoken delivery, not reading
Match voice character to content type and audience
Use appropriate pacing for content comprehension
Ensure professional recording quality standards
common_mistakes: Written-style text that sounds unnatural spoken
Too fast or slow pacing for audience comprehension
